sections.heading: pursuit; section, how construed
sections.text: Section 29-416 shall not be construed so as to make unlawful any arrest in this state which would otherwise be lawful.SourceLaws 1937, c. 70, ยง 3, p. 256;C.S.Supp.,1941, ยง 29-418;R.S.1943, ยง 29-418.
